question: Are you a Greek citizen and have you completed your 12th year of age?
Is this the first time you are issuing an identity card?
Please state your preference below
options: Transliteration of my personal information in Latin characters according to ELOT 743.

I possess a travel or other document issued by a domestic or foreign authority showing a previous transliteration of my personal information (surname, name, father's name, and mother's name) in Latin characters, and I wish those details to be recorded as such, differing from the ELOT 743 standard.

question: Do you wish your blood type to be stated on your ID card? If yes, what type of document will you submit for the inclusion of your blood type?
options: No, I do not wish my blood type to be included on my ID.
Blood donor card, where the blood type and RHESUS are stated.

question: Do you have a visible tattoo on your face that is of a permanent nature?
options: Yes, I have a permanent tattoo on a visible part of my face
No, I do not have a permanent tattoo on my face

question: Can you appear in person at the police authority on the date of the appointment?
options: Yes, I will appear in person
No, I am unable to appear in person at the police authority
